name: LPR® 221
description: LPR® 221 is the next generation of Polysaccharide Resin Technology. This 100% Bio-based emulsifier builds upon Lorama Group’s strength and success of providing the paint formulator with VOC reduction, Excellent gloss, film hardness and adhesion, Compatibility with a wide range of alkyds, Lower formulation costs. LPR® 221 has also been designed to reduce the excessive yellowing seen in most alkyd paints. This feature helps keep white paints looking white.
